t: Mars Inc. - Wikipedia
s: 1 month ago - Forrest Mars started the pet food industry in Europe, and his Mars Candy Company bought Kal Kan. Forrest Mars changed the name of Kal Kan dog food to Pedigree, and Kal Kan cat food to Whiskas. As of 1991, Mars controlled 60 percent of the pet food market, both in volume and value.

t: Mars to acquire the Kellanova family of snack food brands | Mars Global
s: Mars, Incorporated to acquire Kellanova for $35.9 billion, adding iconic snack brands like Pringles and Cheez-It to its portfolio. Deal expected to close in early 2025.

t: Mars bar - Wikipedia
s: 4 weeks ago - The Mars bar was relaunched in January 2010 (initially exclusively through Walmart stores), discontinued again at the end of 2011, and relaunched again in September 2016 by Ethel M, the gourmet chocolate subsidiary of Mars, Inc. The 2016 version was the "original American recipe", without caramel.
